changeSet.author: ThoughtWorks-version1.1
changeSet.sql: update report.course_item_measure set location_id = ( select location_id from report.registration_measure where course_item_measure.flw_id = registration_measure.flw_id )
update report.call_duration_measure set location_id = ( select location_id from report.registration_measure where call_duration_measure.flw_id = registration_measure.flw_id )
update report.sms_sent_measure set location_id = ( select location_id from report.registration_measure where sms_sent_measure.flw_id = registration_measure.flw_id )

changeSet.author: ThoughtWorks-version1.3
changeSet.sql: update report.front_line_worker_dimension set designation = 'AWW' where msisdn in (919576026237,919934240573,919304598102 )

changeSet.author: ThoughtWorks-version1.3
changeSet.sql: update report.front_line_worker_dimension set designation = null where designation = 'INVALID'

changeSet.author: ThoughtWorks-version1.3
changeSet.sql: update report.front_line_worker_dimension set designation = null where designation = ''

changeSet.author: ThoughtWorks-version1.3
changeSet.sql: update report.course_item_dimension set duration = ( select tcc.correct_duration from report.temp_content_correction tcc where tcc.content_name = name ) where name in ( select tcc.content_name from report.temp_content_correction tcc )

update report.course_item_measure set percentage = round(duration * 100.0 / (select duration from report.course_item_dimension cid where cid.id = course_item_id)) where course_item_id in ( select cid.id from report.course_item_dimension cid join report.temp_content_correction tcc on tcc.content_name = cid.name )

changeSet.author: ThoughtWorks-version1.3
changeSet.sql: update report.location_dimension set panchayat = null where panchayat =''
